function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"New designs of living spaces may not effectively address contagious disease propagation","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread within residential buildings","Mitigation":"Implementing effective ventilation systems and sanitization protocols","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, UV germicidal lamps, antimicrobial materials","People":"Residents, building occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Architects, building developers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Sustainability rating methods may not adequately prioritize social and health aspects","Impact":"Neglect of critical health and safety considerations in building design","Mitigation":"Developing new rating methods that prioritize social and health aspects","Technologies":"Building performance assessment tools, health impact assessments","People":"Building designers, sustainability experts, public health professionals","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, sustainability organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate response to pandemic resilience requirements by existing green building certification systems","Impact":"Failure to address specific pandemic-related sustainability indicators","Mitigation":"Adapting existing certification systems to incorporate pandemic resilience requirements","Technologies":"Enhanced building performance monitoring systems, IoT sensors for health and safety monitoring","People":"Building certification bodies, sustainability experts, public health professionals","Owner":"Green building certification organizations, regulatory authorities"}]}
